word:
He whose heart God touches is filled with a great love for those who have never heard the truth. Their condition impresses him with a sense of personal woe. Taking his life in his hand, he hurries away, a God-sent, God-inspired messenger, to do a work in which angels can cooperate.--Ms 73, 1901. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. April 11, 1985, Entire Ms.
